column1: Local Foods////Truffled Egg Salad sandwich is probably one of the top 3 sandwiches I've ever had in my life.  If you want a blinding white atomic explosion of flavor in your mouth ;) HEYOOO
column2: Local Foods has the bomb of a sandwich to execute that mission.  Like Oppenheimer and the Manhattan project
column3: the chefs at this modern shop have created products that will change the Houston sandwich scene.  I've also tried the Duck Confit
column4: whose sweet cranberry preserves the succulent flavor of the fowl.
